name: Gruvi - Alcohol-Free Bubbly Rose - 275ml
description: Gruvi Bubbly Rosé has a refreshing crisp taste and a fruity aroma that blends tart green apple and fresh strawberries. With every bottle, containing only 60 calories and 0.0% alcohol, you can indulge in a guilt-free drink every day. It is gluten-free, sulfite-free, and naturally occurring in sugar. Mix it up by adding muddled figs, honey, and lemon juice to create a zero-proof cocktail that tastes as great as it will make you feel the next day. This sparkling rosé is perfect for charcuterie night, poolside sipping, afternoon happy hours, and anything chocolate. Enjoy without worrying about your total fat, cholesterol, or sodium intake, while getting 1g of protein and 14g of total carbohydrates.

name: Gruvi - Alcohol-Free Dry Secco - 275ml
description: Enjoy a delightful sparkling wine Dry Secco that comes with zero regrets in every bottle. This semi-dry beverage boasts a delicate and floral taste with just the right touch of tartness. It has a perfectly balanced sweetness and dry finish, which is complemented by lively carbonation, a vibrant taste, and a smooth texture with hints of citrus zest. With 0.0% alcohol, this wine serves as a healthier alternative as each bottle only contains 50 calories and 11g of naturally occurring sugars. The unique fermentation-free process used ensures that these natural sugars remain in the wine, making it sweet yet still crisp, dry, and refreshing. This sparkling wine is gluten-free, sulfite-free, Kosher, and vegan-friendly, making it ideal for everyone to enjoy. Perfect for celebratory toasts, beach sunsets, weekend brunch, and truffle mac & cheese dinners.

name: Gruvi - Alcohol-Free Red Wine - 250ml
description: Grüvi in collaboration with its customers has carefully developed Red Blend #3 to create a perfect blend that will satisfy any wine connoisseur. This full-bodied red blend has a smooth, velvety texture with an exquisite balance of tannins and notes of oak and coffee that will delight your palate. With a flavor profile including jammy raspberries and black currant, the Red Blend #3 is a fruity, bold and dry wine that is indistinguishable in taste and texture from its alcoholic counterpart. Unlike alcohol-based wines, Grüvi's dealcoholized wines are unfermented and contain zero alcohol, making it a perfect choice for any occasion. It's vegan-friendly, Kosher-certified, and is gluten-free with no added sugars. With just 45 calories per can, this non-alcoholic wine is ideal for pairing with your favorite dishes and most importantly, it's an excellent companion to any occasion, be it a family dinner, movie night, or backyard barbecue.

name: Gruvi - Alcohol-Free Bubbly Rosé - 275ml
description: Gruvi Bubbly Rosé has a refreshing crisp taste and a fruity aroma that blends tart green apple and fresh strawberries. With every bottle, containing only 60 calories and 0.0% alcohol, you can indulge in a guilt-free drink every day. It is gluten-free, sulfite-free, and naturally occurring in sugar. Mix it up by adding muddled figs, honey, and lemon juice to create a zero-proof cocktail that tastes as great as it will make you feel the next day. This sparkling rosé is perfect for charcuterie night, poolside sipping, afternoon happy hours, and anything chocolate. Enjoy without worrying about your total fat, cholesterol, or sodium intake, while getting 1g of protein and 14g of total carbohydrates.

name: HP Juniper - Non-Alcoholic Tequila
description: An alcohol free, sugar free product made in Québec! Distilled at Brasserie & Distillerie Champ Libre in Mercier and bottled in Cowansville, HP Juniper is the first-ever non-alcoholic spirit made with a blend of aromatics, offering Quebecer gin connoisseurs an authentic experience. Crafted with passion and precision, HP Juniper Tequila represents the pinnacle of tequila craftsmanship. Embracing traditional distillation techniques and the finest agave plants, the artisans have created a tequila of unparalleled quality and flavor. Using a meticulous production process, each batch of HP Tequila is carefully crafted to ensure a smooth and sophisticated taste. The natural ingredients, including hand-selected agave, are expertly distilled to create a tequila that embodies the spirit of Mexico. With its rich amber hue and enticing aroma, HP Tequila delights the senses. From the first sip, you'll experience a velvety texture that dances on the palate, unveiling layers of complexity. The flavors of agave, oak, and hints of citrus harmonize to create a truly remarkable taste experience.

name: Fin Soda - Une Poire Pour la Soif 250ml
description: A creative collaboration between Fin Soda and Stem Bar brings a unique cocktail inspired by white wine. This blend highlights pear as the star ingredient, balanced by bright citrus, subtle eucalyptus, and refined tannins from oolong tea. The result is a fruity yet complex profile, ideal for those seeking something distinctive. Best enjoyed in a wine glass to enhance its aromatic notes and refined character. Born from the partnership with one of Montreal’s beloved wine bars in Little Burgundy, this creation perfectly reflects both brands’ commitment to quality and craft.

name: Gruvi - Alcohol-Free Sangria - 250ml
description: The perfect combination of fruit and spice, our take on the beloved Spanish sparkling bev is delicious and familiar without being overly sweet. 0% ABV250mL bottleMade in Canada. Gluten-free.

name: Fin Soda - Aperitivo 250ml
description: Fin Soda Aperitivo is designed to replicate the authentic taste of a classic Italian bitter. It boasts a complex blend of spicy, bark, and citrus aromas, perfect for sipping over ice with a slice of orange from early evening into the night. This beverage contains just 45 calories per serving.

name: Fin Soda - Ginger Mule 250ml
description: Fin Soda Mule is a uniquely crafted soda, rich in ginger, abundant in chili, and complemented by fresh lime. This creation goes beyond traditional ginger beer, offering a complex, dry, and spicy taste that is impeccably balanced. Its finish is notably long and delivers a fiery kick.

name: Fin Soda - Lemon Verbena Collins 250ml
description: Fin Soda Citron Verveine stands as a testament to elegance in a sparkling lemonade, crafted with an abundance of lemons and a modest amount of sugar. This slightly herbal and exquisitely balanced drink is best savored in a wine glass at any time of the day.

name: Gruvi - Alcohol-Free Juicy IPA - 355ml
description: The Discovery Series offers a collaborative collection of drinks that are created by and for customers. The second batch of Juicy IPA infuses a tropical taste with feedback from the customers. The beer has a hazy color, mouthfeel, and froth, providing an authentic taste. With flavors of pineapple and a hint of fig, this 'Hazy IPA' has a foggy appearance and a more complex flavor due to less filtration. The beer has less than 0.5 ABV, making it a safe option before driving. It contains 50 calories, has no added sugar, and is gluten-reduced with less than 20 ppm. It's the perfect vegan and cruelty-free option for those who are health and environmentally conscious. To enjoy the full experience of Juicy IPA, give the can a gentle roll, pour it into a glass, and sip it slowly. This beverage is best paired with Huevos Rancheros, lazy afternoons at the lake, pineapple fried rice, and rooftop sunsets.

name: NOA - Alcohol-Free Dry Sparkling Wine
description: Aromatic signatureChardonnay, Quince, Apple confit, GrapefruitThought different, our non-alcoholic Dry Sparkling Wine was built up with the grape juice instead of deconstructed by dealcoholization of an alcoholic wine. We developped our tasting profile with the raw material - Chardonnay white grape juice - and built up the finesse of the bubbles and the wine aromatic signature. The illusion is as perfect as your next non-alcoholic Happy Hour.Best servedVery cold in a champagne flute or a coupe. Format : 250 ml

name: Prosyro - Margarita Alternative Liqueur 340ml
description: Making a cocktail has never been easier! Here's a delicious margarita made with fresh lime and quality ingredients! Just add alcohol and syrup to your glass, stir, trop with soda, and you're done. Proportions: 1 oz of margarita pre-assembled cocktail 2oz tequila 2 oz (sparkling) water

name: HP Juniper - Non-Alcoholic Rum
description: An alcohol free, sugar free product made in Québec! Distilled at Brasserie & Distillerie Champ Libre in Mercier and bottled in Cowansville, HP Juniper is the first-ever non-alcoholic spirit made with a blend of aromatics, offering Quebecer gin connoisseurs an authentic experience. Have a try, you'll see it's an excellent alcohol-free alternative. Its taste and complexity will amaze you!

name: HP Juniper - Non-Alcoholic Whisky
description: An alcohol free, sugar free product made in Québec! Distilled at Brasserie & Distillerie Champ Libre in Mercier and bottled in Cowansville, HP Juniper is the first-ever non-alcoholic spirit made with a blend of aromatics, offering Quebecer gin connoisseurs an authentic experience. HP Juniper Whiskey is a testament to craftsmanship and tradition. Meticulously distilled and aged to perfection, it embodies the rich heritage of whiskey-making. With its deep amber color and enticing aromas, HP Whiskey entices the senses. Each sip reveals a harmonious blend of flavors, from warm caramel and toasted oak to hints of vanilla and spice. Experience the timeless elegance and exceptional taste of HP Whiskey, a true testament to the art of whiskey craftsmanship.

name: NOA - Non-Alcoholic Spirit - Amaretto
description: With those notes of macadamia nuts, toasted almonds and maple syrup, the illusion of a traditional amaretto is perfect. Mix it like its alcoholic version, whether it's Amaretto & Lemon, Amaretto Sour or in a coffee.Size: 700 ml

name: Prosyro - Gentiane Parisienne Alternative Liqueur 340ml
description: Here comes the sun: a gentiane-forward syrup that can hold a candle to it's alcoholic counterparts. Its innate bitterness makes the product self-balanced and fresh. Try it with any citrus base to reveal its true power. A white Negroni or a Suzie Americano without alcohol? It's now possible.The new line, Alternative Liqueur by Prosyro, is exactly what your heart has been waiting for. A great first for Canadian bars and bartenders, since it's not available to the public at this time. Non-alcoholic, highly concentrated, affordable, freeze-resistant, shelf-stable, squeezable: cocktail specialist-designed alternatives to recreate celebrated cocktails. Yes, it's a mouthful. But it really is all that. It took a full year of experimentation, tasting, and cocktail-making to finalize these bad boys, using a careful blend of herb maceration, tinctures, and brain juice. The magical thing here is that you can ALSO use them as a great alternative for the liquors you desperately want... but that you can't seem to source anywhere.

name: HP Juniper - Gin Tonic Mocktail (355ml)
description: A ready-to-drink alcohol-free gin & tonic whose unique taste comes from a carefully chosen blend of natural botanical aromatics to respect the original recipe of natural quinine. The perfect cocktail/mocktail for all occasions: party, parks , beach, pool, BBQ, camping, etc… Cheers! Low Calories, No OGM, No Aspartame, Gluten Free, Natural Cane sugar, Vegan Friendly. Nose: Citrus and spicesTaste: In the spirit of a classic gin & tonic, with predominant notes of juniper berries, accompanied by citrus zest and followed by a bitter finish using natural quinineStorage: Store in a dry place at a constant temperature and consume it well chilled, refrigerate before opening Ingredients: juniper berries, yuzu lemons, organic cucumbers, cinnamon, lemongrass, eucalyptus, rosemary, coriander seeds

name: NOA - Non-Alcoholic Spirit - Italian bitter
description: Distinguished Notes Orange, Grapefruit, Cinnamon, Star Anise, Gentian. For the aficionados of bold bitterness and those who have an appreciation for iconic Campari, our Italian bitters, tinted in a deep red, echo the timeless Italian tradition of invigorating aperitifs. At its core, the pronounced bitterness of gentian and quinine bark is beautifully evident. Infused with a foundation of fresh grapefruit and orange, its multifaceted palate is enriched by undertones of gentian root and aromatic spices. While it sets a lively prelude as an aperitif, it's equally captivating as a tranquil nightcap. Additionally, it harmonizes exceptionally well with our non-alcoholic Red Vermouth, crafting a beverage symphony. To elevate its profile, introduce a hint of tartness, accentuating the vibrant grapefruit essence. Optimal Servings: Neatly over ice. Paired with sparkling water, garnished with an orange slice. Blended with the zest of fresh orange, grapefruit, or watermelon juice. As the foundation of a Negroni. Enhancing a Boulevardier or Rosita. Perfect for a Spritz. As the essence in a Caipiritaly. Invigorating an Americano. Or in any context that calls for the classic Campari. Volume: 700 ml.

name: NOA - Non-Alcoholic Spirit - Spiced rum
description: This non-alcoholic rum is the culmination of more than three years of research and development. The journey began with experimenting with ginger, blackstrap molasses, and roasted pineapple peel to capture a Jamaican style's funkiness. However, the final blend is a spicy variation that focuses on the essence of sugar cane and evokes the warmth of a summer beach, enriched with notes of cinnamon, allspice, and cardamom. It features distinct notes of allspice, lime, cinnamon, cardamom, and molasses.

name: NOA - Non-Alcoholic Spirit - Dry Gin
description: Inspired by traditional compound gin, NOA's non-alcoholic "Dry Gin" captures the essence of this classic spirit through a meticulous maceration of botanicals like juniper berry, lemon, coriander seed, and star anise. The result? An unexpected burst of aromatic flavors in a non-alcoholic product. With a slightly sweet texture, Dry Gin defies conventions, delivering a complex, character-rich experience whether enjoyed neat or in a mocktail. Best served: On ice In a Gin & Tonic or Gin & Sonic With sparkling water or 7Up In a Sour In a Martini In a Mule In a Bloody Caesar In a French 75 In a Fizz Or as you would any other gin! Gluten-Free, Vegan

name: Prosyro - Espresso Martini Alternative Liqueur 340ml
description: Indulge in the hottest trend with our Espresso Martini Syrup, the ultimate choice for cocktail enthusiasts and mocktail aficionados alike. This non-alcoholic syrup brings the rich and intense flavors of espresso to your glass, delivering an exquisite experience with every sip. What sets this syrup apart is its special foamer ingredient, which creates a luxurious and velvety foam when shaken. Crafted with only the finest ingredients, you can expect exceptional quality and a perfectly balanced taste in every mix. Elevate your beverage game and savor the irresistible allure of an Espresso Martini with our premium syrup. HOW TO USE 1 oz of espresso martini 2 oz vodka or spiced rhum 1 oz water Shake well in a shaker with ice Feel free to add additional flavors like passion fruit or blueberry syrup to enhance your beverage even more

name: HP Juniper - Floral Gin Tonic Mocktail (355ml)
description: A ready-to-drink alcohol-free gin & tonic whose unique taste comes from a carefully chosen blend of natural botanical aromatics to respect the original recipe of natural quinine. The perfect cocktail/mocktail for all occasions : party, parks, beach, pool, BBQ, camping, etc… Cheers! Nose: Flower bouquet and vegetal notes of cucumberTaste: In the spirit of a floral gin & tonic, with soft and silky notes of juniper, rose, violet and rosemary, with a pleasant finish of fresh cucumberStorage: Store in a dry place at a constant temperature and consume it well chilled, refrigerate before opening. Ingredients: rose, hibiscus, eucalyptus, cucumber flowers, juniper berries

name: Projet Pilote Eclat Hydrosol 750ml
description: A fruit-forward hydrosol crafted in Montreal with Quebec strawberry, lemon, grapefruit, raspberry, blueberry, cantaloupe, lemongrass, and cumin. Refreshing and vibrant, with a natural citrus complexity. Use: Perfect for creating Clover Clubs, Brambles, or Cosmopolitans — or as a lively addition to sparkling mocktails.

name: HP Juniper - Whisky Cola Mocktail (355ml)
description: A ready-to-drink non-alcoholic whisky cola, with a rich and balanced taste profile, using only carefully selected premium ingredients. The perfect cocktail/mocktail for all occasions: party, parks, beach, pool, BBQ, camping, etc… Cheers! Low Calories, No OGM, No Aspartame, Gluten Free, Natural Cane sugar, Vegan Friendly Nose: Cola and smoked oakTaste: In the spirit of a classic whisky cola, with soft and silky notes of caramel and vanilla, well-dosed sugar with a pleasant light warm finish.Storage: Store in a dry place at a constant temperature and consume it well chilled, refrigerate before opening.

name: Seedlip - Non-Alcoholic Spirit - Grove 42
description: A vibrant citrus blend capturing the essence of Mediterranean orchards. Seedlip Grove 42 combines the zesty notes of blood orange, bitter orange, and mandarin with the aromatic freshness of lemongrass, ginger, and lemon peel. A subtle touch of Japanese sansho peppercorn adds a gentle warmth to the finish. Key Features: Botanical Composition: Blood orange, bitter orange, mandarin, lemongrass, ginger, lemon peel, and sansho peppercorn. Dietary Information: Calorie-free, sugar-free, and allergen-friendly. Usage: Ideal for non-alcoholic cocktails such as a Grove & Tonic, Grove Margarita, or Citrus Fizz. Serving Suggestion: Best enjoyed over ice with tonic water, garnished with an orange twist. Packaging: 700 ml bottle, yielding approximately 12–14 servings.
